Text.text: 1. Check that the map loads without any clustering modes.
2. Click 'Enable Grid Clustering (show grid)' and check that clusters are created.
3. Click "Enable Grid Clustering (hot grid)" and check that there is clustering.
4. Click "Enable Grid Clustering with 2 different grids" and check that two grids are created displaying clusters.

Button.text: Enable Grid Clustering with 2 different grids

Text.text: 5.Click "Enable Distance Clustering " and check that distance clusters are created.
6. Click "Enable Mixed Clustering" and check that there is more than one type of clustering.
7. Click "Enable Tree Clustering" and check that tree clusters are created.
8. Click "Enable Tree Clustering with Sub Areas" and check that the clusters have sub areas.

Button.text: Enable Tree Clustering with Sub Areas

Text.text: 9. Click "Enable Tree Clustering with Super Area" and check that the clusters have super areas.

Button.text: Enable Tree Clustering with Super Area
